original_text:
The Lord has made his salvation known
    and revealed his righteousness to the nations.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 구원을 알게 하시며 그의 공의를 뭇 나라의 목전에서 명백히 나타내셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has made his salvation known
and revealed his righteousness to the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 민족에게 그의 의를 드러내셨습니다
